page.title: 14A Ticehurst Farm
page.content:
My dad works on the family farm from 6.30 a.m. to 8.30 p.m. seven days a week.
The farm is 150 acres and is used for mixed farming. We have 70 cows about 78 sheep and 22 chickens.
The buildings on the farm include 2 houses, 1 dairy, 2 cow sheds, 1 pig pen and 10 sheds 8 of which are used for machinery.
He uses a combine harvester, 4 tractors, 2 bailers, a plough, a rotivator, 2 bail collectors, 5 trailers, a fertilizer spreader, a muck spreader, a snow plough, a silage mover and a landrover.
